text: Can we add costume class in {% dnd_section  %} boilerplate?
Is there a limit to how many rows can be in a column? I’m getting some weird behavior where a row is inside of a section/column but is separated into a separate row that is breaking my layout
it appears normal in the “editor” which makes it all even more confusing
Now I think it was my fault but it’s a bit unclear. I moved it to a different section
